title: Projects
subtitle: 小成果展示
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:t,jsxs:a}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const o={a:"a",code:"code",figcaption:"figcaption",figure:"figure",h2:"h2",hr:"hr",img:"img",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",...r.components},{BadgeGroup:s}=o;return s||function(e,t){throw new Error("Expected "+(t?"component":"object")+" `"+e+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it.")}("BadgeGroup",!0),a(e,{children:[t(o.h2,{children:t(o.a,{href:"https://taboo-ai.vercel.app",children:"Taboo AI"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:t(o.img,{src:"https://github.com/xmliszt/resources/blob/main/taboo-ai/images/v300/poster3.0(features).png?raw=true",alt:"Taboo AI"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"Taboo AI offers English learners a gamified experience to practice English expressions and vocabulary, with feedbacks. The game is based on the popular board game Taboo, where players have to describe a word without using a list of forbidden words."}),"
",t(s,{tags:["typescript","nextjs","tailwindcss","supabase","postgres"]}),"
",t(o.hr,{}),"
",t(o.h2,{children:t(o.a,{href:"https://www.npmjs.com/package/easy-next",children:"Easy Next"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:t(o.img,{src:"https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/portfolio-35dfd.appspot.com/o/v2%2FtAD6hG0KxDMM1OiiRmfhRgXyY1d2%2Fprojects%2Feasy-next-poster.png?alt=media&token=acd43a73-7806-4aab-8929-18935cda0127",alt:"Easy Next"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"Easy Next is a CLI template tool to create a new Next.js App Router Typescript project with a single command. It's a wrapper around the Next.js CLI, with a few extra features, like choosing a template, adding TypeScript, and more."}),"
",a(o.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:[t(o.figcaption,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-title":"","data-language":"bash","data-theme":"github-dark-dimmed",children:"easy-next usage"}),t(o.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#22272e",color:"#adbac7"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"bash","data-theme":"github-dark-dimmed",children:t(o.code,{"data-language":"bash","data-theme":"github-dark-dimmed",style:{display:"grid"},children:a(o.span,{"data-line":"",children:[t(o.span,{style:{color:"#F69D50"},children:"npx"}),t(o.span,{style:{color:"#96D0FF"},children:" easy-next@latest"})]})})})]}),"
",t(s,{tags:["javascript","nodejs","npm"]}),"
",t(o.hr,{}),"
",t(o.h2,{children:t(o.a,{href:"https://costume-party.web.app/",children:"Costume party"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:t(o.img,{src:"https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/portfolio-35dfd.appspot.com/o/v2%2FtAD6hG0KxDMM1OiiRmfhRgXyY1d2%2Fprojects%2FArtboard%201.png?alt=media&token=75e3fece-c208-4ff2-824f-c088f1c285fe",alt:"Costume party"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"Costume party brings the fun of Costume Party Assassins board game to the web. It's a last-man-standing game where players have to guess other players' identities through their actions and movements across the rooms, and carry out assassinations to be the last one alive."}),"
",t(s,{tags:["typescript","vuejs","firebase"]}),"
",t(o.hr,{}),"
",t(o.h2,{children:t(o.a,{href:"https://xmliszt.itch.io/mario-final",children:"Mario recreated"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:t(o.img,{src:"https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/portfolio-35dfd.appspot.com/o/v2%2FtAD6hG0KxDMM1OiiRmfhRgXyY1d2%2Fprojects%2FMario%20Final.png?alt=media&token=d38ee634-050a-4831-a5fa-7f34d7596e50",alt:"Mario recreated"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"A unity project where I recreated the levels of the original Mario game, with increased difficulties and new mechanics. For example, Mario have a inventory system to store up to 4 power-ups."}),"
",t(s,{tags:["c#","unity"]}),"
",t(o.hr,{})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:a}=e.components||{};return a?t(a,{...e,children:t(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Hobbies
subtitle: 兴趣爱好
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:t}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(o){const i={a:"a",h2:"h2",p:"p",strong:"strong",...o.components};return t(e,{children:[n(i.p,{children:"生活怎么能缺少兴趣爱好？"}),"
",n(i.h2,{children:"Music composition 🎹"}),"
",t(i.p,{children:["I like to write my emotions and stories into music. I think this is a great way to store memories and feelings. I have a MIDI keyboard, a guitar, and a microphone. I previously used ",n(i.strong,{children:"Fl Studio 12"}),", and then switch to ",n(i.strong,{children:"GarageBand"})," because it is free. And now I'm using ",n(i.strong,{children:"Logic Pro X"})," as it provides more comprehensive features."]}),"
",t(i.p,{children:["I do have a YouTube channel where I upload my music. You can check it out ",n(i.a,{href:"https://youtube.com/@bbfishstudio8837",children:"here"}),"! When I have completed a piece of music, I will use ",n(i.strong,{children:"Adobe Audition"})," to mix and master it. I also use ",n(i.strong,{children:"Adobe After Effects"})," to create the PV for my music, mostly just a simple visualizer with some effects. I will carefully choose the background image so that it matches the mood of the music and how I feel when I wrote it."]}),"
",t(i.p,{children:["Follow my ",n(i.a,{href:"https://instagram.com/bbfish_studio",children:"Instagram"})," to see my music!"]}),"
",n(i.h2,{children:"Roller skating 🛼"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"..."}),"
",n(i.h2,{children:"Photography 📷"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"..."}),"
",t(i.p,{children:["Follow my ",n(i.a,{href:"https://instagram.com/bbfish.photo",children:"Instagram"})," to see my photos!"]}),"
",n(i.h2,{children:"Reading 📚"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"Here are some of my favorite books:"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"..."})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:t}=e.components||{};return t?n(t,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Hi! I'm Li Yuxuan
subtitle: 你好啊！我是李雨轩

Come back later for more stuff about me ;)"})]})}return{default:function(t={}){const{wrapper:n}=t.components||{};return n?e(n,{...t,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...t})}):_createMdxContent(t)}};
